dialogue_metadata.inferred_relationship: Colleagues or co-hosts of a podcast.
dialogue_metadata.inferred_vibe: Informal and conversational, discussing financial news.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: ...so it's like, a huge deal, right? The dollar, uh, dropping below 500 tenge in Kazakhstan.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: ...so it's like, a huge deal, right? The dollar, uh, dropping below five hundred tenge in Kazakhstan.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: At the close of daytime trading on the Kazakhstan Stock Exchange (KASE), the weighted average exchange rate of the US dollar stood at 498.25 tenge, dropping by 3.31 tenge.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Yes, exactly! I mean, it officially closed at what, 498.25 tenge on KASE?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Yes, exactly! I mean, it officially closed at what, four hundred ninety eight point two five tenge on K A S E?
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: At the close of daytime trading on the Kazakhstan Stock Exchange (KASE), the weighted average exchange rate of the US dollar stood at 498.25 tenge, dropping by 3.31 tenge.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Yeah, 498.25, that's a drop of 3.31 tenge! Pretty significant, if you ask me.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Yeah, four hundred ninety eight point two five, that's a drop of three point three one tenge! Pretty significant, if you ask me.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: At the close of daytime trading on the Kazakhstan Stock Exchange (KASE), the weighted average exchange rate of the US dollar stood at 498.25 tenge, dropping by 3.31 tenge.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Significant, yes! And, um, the National Bank's official rate is still a bit higher, 501.81.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Significant, yes! And, um, the National Bank's official rate is still a bit higher, five hundred one point eight one.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: The official exchange rate set by the National Bank for March 27 is 501.81 tenge per dollar.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: But that's still, like, barely over 500, you know? It's hovering.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: But that's still, like, barely over five hundred, you know? It's hovering.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Right! And if you look at Almaty, it's already, like, squarely below.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Right! And if you look at Almaty, it's already, like, squarely below.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Oh, Almaty! Kurs.kz, right? Buying at 498.81. That's, uh, really low.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Oh, Almaty! the website, right? Buying at four hundred ninety eight point eight one. That's, uh, really low.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: According to kurs.kz, the current average exchange rate for purchasing US dollars in Almaty exchange offices is 498.81 tenge, while the selling rate is 501.01 tenge.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Yes, exactly! And selling for five hundred one point zero one.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: According to kurs.kz, the current average exchange rate for purchasing US dollars in Almaty exchange offices is 498.81 tenge, while the selling rate is 501.01 tenge.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: So, you're, uh, buying it under 500 there.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: So, you're, uh, buying it under five hundred there.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Totally. And in Astana, even lower for buying – 497.00! That's wild.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Totally. And in Astana, even lower for buying - four hundred ninety seven point zero zero! That's wild.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: In Astana, the dollar is being bought at an average of 497.00 tenge and sold at 502.98 tenge.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Yeah, 497.00, it's, like, a real dip.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Yeah, four hundred ninety seven point zero zero, it's, like, a real dip.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: So the tenge is just, totally strengthening. Economists are saying that, right?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: So the tenge is just, totally strengthening. Economists are saying that, right?
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Dollar drops below 500. Economists explain tenge™s strengthening

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Yes, exactly! They've been forecasting this, too.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Yes, exactly! They've been forecasting this, too.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Earlier, financial market experts in Kazakhstan shared their forecasts for the dollar exchange rate.
